lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: Thank you for your help. I'm Genevieve.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: I'm Amelia.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: And I'm Marcus. We're part of Cronna Cape's city guard.

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: City guards? I thought you guys didn't patrol around this part of the city.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: We don't. The only reason we're here is to get at this guy.

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: Oh, did Faust threaten you too?

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: He tried to kill me, and I want to find out why.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: Or at least get some revenge. Looks like you want the same thing Genevieve, considering how you blasted him. Where did you get a magical catalyst that strong?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: This? It belongs to my family. They brought it with them when they evacuated Bridhurst.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: You're a refugee from Bridhurst? You're lucky to have gotten out alive before, well...

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: The whole country was overrun by monsters! Did you see a monster? What did it look like?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: Well, um, I was really young at the time and uh-

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: I know you're curious Amelia, but don't make her uncomfortable. Why don't you interrogate Faust instead? It's what we came here for.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: You're letting me do the interrogation?

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Amelia, he tried to kill me. I don't care how rough you are with him.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: Got it.

lines.comment: Amelia kicks Faust and wakes him up off the ground against the wall.
lines.text: Hey scumbag! Wake up!

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Ugh. What the heck are a couple of guards doing here? I thought you guys didn't care what happened over here.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: I'm the one asking questions. Why did you attack Marcus? What are you threatening people?

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: I'm just trying to get people on our side. The side of Bridhurst. Getting back what we once had.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: Through murder and extortion? Don't act so noble. Why don't I knock that smug look off your face.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: You'll regret this. I already have people on my side you know. Very powerful people.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Oh, really? Did they tell you to attack me?

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Hello Marcus. Must be nice being the guard captain's son. You never have to worry about any consequences of your actions, you can just have your old man Hammond bail you out. It was nice to be able to shock a spoiled brat like you with reality.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: You don't know me or my father.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Is that so?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: You're going to jail where you can't hurt us anymore.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: You can't imprison me, my allies will see to that. And even if your could it would accomplish nothing. They would just send someone else to the docks tomorrow night.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: Who said anything about jail? There's more than one way to make sure you stay put.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Yes, we aren't exactly working by the book here.

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: Wait, what did he just say about tomorrow night?

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Tch.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: He mentioned something about the docks.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: He did, didn't he? Let something slip you shouldn't have, Faust?

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: You heard nothing!
Hey Erina! What's taking you so long?

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: He escaped?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: He got teleported by someone else. Short range, looks like. They're still nearby!

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: There!

lines.speaker: Erina
lines.text: Perceptive, aren't you? Not that it matters, we'll be leaving shortly.
Oh, and Faust? When we get back I'll need to teach you to keep that mouth of your shut.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: You think we'll let you leave?

lines.comment: Erina summons guards to block the alley they are escaping down.
lines.speaker: Erina
lines.text: Oh, I believe you will.
